title: Living tomorrow. No. 105
brief_description: Explanation of space guard type burglar alarm; headaches and cat scans, x-rays and computer analysis; communication via a signal lamp and machinery on building sites; flats, caravans and adequate fire alarms and access for vehicles, ie grass and concrete patterned pathways.
